themes.name: default
themes.description: A clean, modern light theme suitable for most application interfaces

themes.name: space-tech
themes.description: Space tech style with dark backgrounds and bright cyan and blue accents, creating a futuristic feel

themes.name: dark
themes.description: A sleek dark mode theme with blue accents, providing reduced eye strain and modern aesthetics suitable for both professional and gaming applications

themes.name: mono-round
themes.description: Minimalist rounded design with soft colors and large rounded elements for a modern look

themes.name: neon-arcade
themes.description: Vibrant neon style with bright purples, blues and pinks, perfect for arcade or cyberpunk games

themes.name: dark-rpg
themes.description: Dark RPG style with deep tones and mysterious purple elements, suitable for role-playing games

themes.name: fantasy
themes.description: Fantasy world theme with ancient styles and textures, perfect for medieval or magical games

themes.name: scifi
themes.description: Sci-fi theme with futuristic blue tones and sharp edges, ideal for space or tech themed games

themes.name: retro
themes.description: Retro style with pixel feel and vibrant contrasting colors, nostalgic game interface

themes.name: apocalypse
themes.description: Apocalypse style, dark and gritty tones, suitable for post-apocalyptic themes

themes.name: cyberpunk
themes.description: Cyberpunk style with neon colors and future urban aesthetics

themes.name: candy
themes.description: Candy style, bright and colorful, suitable for casual or children's games

themes.name: super-retro
themes.description: Super retro style, 8-bit pixel art, extreme old-school game feel

themes.name: cartoon-game
themes.description: Cartoon game style, lively and cute, suitable for casual games

themes.name: minimalist-dark
themes.description: Minimalist dark theme, clean and simple dark tone design

themes.name: glossy-cyan
themes.description: Glossy cyan theme, smooth surfaces and reflective effects, modern tech feel

themes.name: clash-style
themes.description: Game UI style inspired by Clash of Clans with vibrant colors and visual hierarchy

themes.name: neon-teal
themes.description: Neon teal style, modern bright tones, suitable for fashionable game interfaces

themes.name: neon-blue
themes.description: Neon blue tones, cool neon effects with strong tech feel

themes.name: amber-gold
themes.description: Amber gold style, warm gold tones with luxurious feel
